activities: Premiere Portal collects de-personalized mobile device data, when such a device is located near the retail space of one of our customers. The information we collect may include the device’s signal strength, manufacturer, presence, device ID, and Media Access Control Address (MAC) Address. Additionally, we collect personal information from users who access the Wi-Fi network of one of our retail customers via the services we provide. We use this data to operate and improve our services. All uses of the information we collect are outlined in our privacy policy.
